short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add more informations for each app when browsing Shopify App Store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add more useful information for Shopify Apps on Shopfiy App Store.

Shopify App Store Enhancer:
✓ Add information box for each app listing page
✓ Show information box on app store searches
✓ Update app information ranking daily
✓ Fetch user estimates for each app
✓ Show latest app store ranking changes
✓ Show latest number of reviews

Added app information:
- App Ranking
- App Ranking changes
- Users estimate
- Created date and time of the app
- Number of reviews added last month
